item.title: A Developer's Journey With Spacial Computing
item.description: When I first slid on the Apple Vision Pro, I was bracing myself for another overhyped gadget. Instead, what I encountered was a transformative leap into the future of digital interaction. This wasn’t merely a high-tech toy; it was a tool that seamlessly wove itself into my daily coding rituals, shattering my preconceived limits of what technology could achieve. From that moment, I was hookedâ€”immersed in a mixed reality that felt both groundbreaking and surprisingly intuitive.
